properties.headline: Flood Warning issued February 7 at 8:54PM EST until February 10 at 9:56PM EST by NWS Blacksburg VA
properties.description:
...Forecast Flooding Changed from Minor to
Moderate Severity for the following rivers in Virginia...
Dan River at South Boston affecting Halifax County

Rainfall runoff continues to impact area rivers.  The Dan River has
experienced exceptional rises from Wentworth North Carolina downstream
to South Boston Virginia.  The Dan River at South Boston is expected
to reach to just over the moderate threshold of 29.0 feet during
the day Saturday.

* until Monday evening
* At 08PM Friday the river level was 25.8 feet and rising.
* Flood Stage is 22.0 feet.
* Minor flooding is occurring AND Moderate flooding is forecast.
* The river will continue rising to near 29.2 feet Saturday.
* Impact...at 29.0 feet...A number of businesses in the Riverdale
area are affected.
properties.instruction:
Do not drive through flooded areas...the water may be much deeper
than you think.

Listen to noaa weather radio or your favorite media outlet for later
statements or warnings.
